channel.title: The Beneath on Sword and Tower Games
channel.description: Recent content in The Beneath on Sword and Tower Games

item.title: My Weekly Work Lunch Game, Part One
item.description: For over five years, I’ve worked at a tech startup writing code. During that time, I’ve had the pleasure to run a game of Dungeons and Dragons fifth edition for my coworkers during our lunch break. Many of those players had their first experience with tabletop RPGs at our one-hour-long games. So far, we’ve been playing almost every week for five straight years. This series is a recap of our adventures, the drama, and the communal storytelling we’ve shared in a world that I’ve called “The Beneath.
